title: Quiz - Descriptions Complexes
description: Quiz sur les descriptions détaillées et les comparaisons

questions.question: Which sentence is more descriptive?
options: She is incredibly kind and always helps others
questions.explanation: The second option provides specific details and examples, making it more descriptive.

questions.question: How do you compare two people's heights?
options: John is more tall than Mary
questions.explanation: 'Taller than' is the correct comparative form for the adjective 'tall'.

questions.question: What makes a description more interesting?
questions.explanation: Specific details and examples make descriptions more vivid and engaging.
